content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

The Ikegami MKC-X800 is the first medical grade native 4k resolution camera on the market. It uses a standard C-mount, and is compatible with all of our Accu-Beam® video adapters.

  • Native 4k resolution (2160p)
  • High Dynamic Range (HDR)
  • 1/2.52″ 1-chip CMOS sensor
  • Standard C-mount
  • F8 light sensitivity
  • HDMI 2.0, DVI, and 12G SDI outputs
  • 5 or 7 meter cable, 10m extension available
  • Ethernet network connectivity

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”72715″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1574810492512{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Ikegami MKC-X800

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Future-proof your video system by purchasing a 4k medical C-mount system at its lowest-ever price, and be ahead of the curve when 4k becomes the new standard. The Ikegami MKC-X800 is the best medical grade option for capturing 4k video of anterior segment surgery.

Compatible with all of our Accu-Beam® adapters the MKC-X800 can be configured to any magnification you prefer, with the option for optical zoom for the best video experience.

The full specifications for the MKC-X800 can be found here.

Sample videos can be found on our YouTube page.

Part # MKC-X800

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Compatibility” tab_id=”1569386751404-824b66ba-0d543d87-74d1″][vc_column_text]

Compatible with all of our Accu-Beam® video adapters.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3d3d87-74d1″][vc_column_text]

Ikegami C-mount cameras are class 1 devices, and are approved to bear the CE mark.

TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Warranty” tab_id=”1569387831165-1b59dea1-014a3d87-74d1″][vc_column_text]

Ikegami C-mount cameras include a 3 year manufacturer’s warranty.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
